lines.text: Nobody fucked it up, Mr. Meechum. Just don't expect Hollywood to bail you out.

[as he menaces Roberta Gillian with a knife]
Am I sympathetic? Will they like me? Please don't lie to me! Is it an important book?
Anybody can kill anybody, even the President, remember?

[Lt. Meechum is admiring his collection]
First editions, every one of them.

[after killing someone in a bathroom]
You forgot to flush.
Don't step forward. It's a long drop.
That was the second time you've embarassed me, now try to control yourself, please.
